question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service-v2/src/live_data_service/mod.rs] [Function: start_streaming()] [Resource cleanup] At lines 222-224, stream cleanup happens in three steps - if any step fails, can streams leak in connection_manager's tracking? (Medium)
